name: Planet miner (Ape in the tree)
description:
Planet miner is A fast paced mining game in wich your goal is to escape from the space-worm before it catches you and turns you into its lunch

controls are explained ingame but I'll still put them under here

wasd or arrows for movement, esc to pause / exit menu's leftclick to buy stuff in store.

made for the beginners circle gamejam #3,  thx angry for hosting this amazing jam.
